alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 05 at 8:55AM AKDT until August 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 10 PM AKDT SUNDAY FOR MIDDLE TANANA VALLEY... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 10 PM AKDT Sunday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Middle Tanana Valley. * TIMING...From Sunday afternoon to Sunday evening. * WINDS...Southeast 10 to 15 mph. Gusts 20 to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs 80 to 90. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
